job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_details.full_text:
AI Software Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of applications built on large language models (LLMs) and other generative AI technologies. Key responsibilities include creating autonomous support platforms using LLMs, integrating state-of-the-art AI like GPT-4 Vision, and building systems that interact with users (e.g., customer support chatbots). The role also involves software development for these AI systems and their deployment on cloud platforms like AWS, aligning directly with the definition and evidence profile of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs' directly relates to building and adapting generative models for specific applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools' and 'creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process', which are core software engineering activities for user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools

job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision' involves working with and implementing advanced generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows' indicates understanding how AI can benefit business operations and guiding others on its use.
job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures' points to operational aspects of managing and improving deployed AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction' relates to the software development lifecycle and user support.
job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality' highlights the alignment of AI solutions with business goals and service improvement.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
